Lake Ouachita Campgrounds

Name
Lake Ouachita State Park Campgrounds
Description
Campsites available. Plus Cabins and Campers for rent.
Location
5451 Mountain Pine Rd Garland County, AR
Latitude: 34.61863020 Longitude: -93.17732710


Name
Buckville Campgrounds
Description
Buckville is a primitive camping area located on the north end of Lake Ouachita. There is no charge for camping at these areas. Amenities include pit toilets, concrete tables, lantern post, ground grill, pedestal grill, boat ramp.
Location
Buckville Road Garland County, AR
Latitude: 34.609570 Longitude: -93.344140
Name
Iron Fork Campgrounds
Description
Irons Fork is a primitive camping area located on the north end of Lake Ouachita. There is no charge for camping at these areas. Amenities include pit toilets, concrete tables, ground grill, pedestal grill, lantern post, boat ramp.
Location
Ironsfork Point Garland County, AR
Latitude: 34.6700932 Longitude: -93.3626888
